thingsToKnow.title: Things to know
thingsToKnow.policies: Room was very clean and looked just like the photo. Quiet little hotel, especially during the day. Evening you hear some music from nearby places.

FAQ.title: FAQ
FAQ.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Did you find the question as you expected?

items.question: What services do you provide?
items.answer: We offer a wide range of services including web development, mobile apps, and design.

items.question: How long does a project take?
items.answer: Project duration depends on the scope, usually between 2 to 6 weeks.

items.question: Do you offer support after delivery?
items.answer: Yes, we provide free bug fixes for 1 month and optional long-term support.

items.question: What are your payment methods?
items.answer: We accept bank transfer, PayPal, and credit card payments.

items.question: Can you work with international clients?
items.answer: Yes, we collaborate with clients worldwide through remote communication tools.

userprofile.title: My profile
userprofile.desc: Hosts and guests can see your profile and it may appear across Skava to help us build trust in our community
